description: External modifications to the existing  B1 office buidling with removal of existing concrete slab along Gloucester Way to form lightwell with external steps accessing basement as well as new crittal windows at basement level to match existing windows;  creation of new ground floor accessible entrance door along Meridith Street and double glazed crittal screen at ground floor facing onto Gloucester Way together with replacement firedoors and the erection of single storey staircase enlcosure at roof level with guard rail along roof perimeter as well as the installation of air handling plant equipment at roof level.
decision_conditions:
3 YEAR CONSENT PERIOD:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
